
-==-

Memory Info Logger

log.mem.info   # print info about a query input
args: rArg     # - arg can be a memory region ID or an address
[Punkline]
<log.mem.info> NTSC 1.02
7C0802A6 9421FFA0 90010064 7C000026 90010030 BEE10034 480001B4 4E800021 204D656D 44657363 5B25785D 202D2D20 54595045 3A202573 20257320 20204445 53433A20 25387820 20205354 4152543A 20253878 20202054 4F54414C 3A202523 20387820 62797465 73002048 45415000 43414348 45004672 65652020 20202000 416C6C6F 63617465 64002020 20257320 20204652 4147533A 20252320 38782020 20424947 47455354 3A202538 78202825 23203878 20627974 65732920 20544F54 414C3A20 25232038 78206279 74657300 4452414D 00535241 4D00204D 656D4465 73635B25 785D202D 2D204E4F 54204143 54495645 00204D65 6D446573 635B2578 5D202D2D 20257320 3A202538 78202020 53544152 543A2025 38782020 2053495A 453A2025 23203130 78202020 4F464653 45543A20 25232031 30782020 20515545 52593A20 25387800 20537461 74696320 25357320 2D2D2053 54415254 3A202538 78202020 51554552 593A2025 38782020 204F4646 5345543A 20252320 31307800 20282538 78206973 206E6F74 20612076 616C6964 20717565 72793B20 75736520 61204452 414D2F53 52414D20 61646472 65737320 6F722061 204D656D 44657363 20494420 302E2E2E 35290000 4BFFFE51 7FE802A6 7C7D1B78
